name: Spider Hunt
description:
This is my submission for the University of Birmingham 1up Jam 2021. 

The aim of the game is to catch the spider with the jar before your housemate gets home. The spider is sneaky and fast, so you might need to ambush the spider when it is not expecting it.

The pixel art furniture was taken from an art pack created by PurpleHeart on OpenGameArt.org

https://opengameart.org/content/ph64-pixel-pack-100s-of-sideview-asset

The sounds were taken from Freesound. Here are the links to the sounds I used:

https://freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/243020/

https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/350988/

https://freesound.org/people/spookymodem/sounds/202108/

https://freesound.org/people/EVRetro/sounds/535840/

Thanks to my boyfriend for help with the Godot engine!

I hope you enjoy the game! :)
